pages.md:
# Using the Menus

To display the menus, press **MENU/OK**.

!Menu Button

## The Menus

Different menus are displayed during still photography, movie recording, and playback.

### Shooting

- **STILL/MOVIE mode dial rotated to STILL**

  !Still Mode Menu

  - IMAGE QUALITY SETTING
  - IMAGE SIZE
  - IMAGE QUALITY
  - RAW RECORDING
  - SELECT JPEG/HEIF
  - FILM SIMULATION
  - MONOCHROMATIC COLOR
  - GRAIN EFFECT
  - COLOR CHROME EFFECT

- **STILL/MOVIE mode dial rotated to MOVIE**

  !Movie Mode Menu

  - MOVIE SETTING
  - MOVIE SETTING LIST
  - MOVIE MODE
  - HIGH SPEED REC
  - SELF-TIMER
  - MEDIA REC SETTING
  - HDMI OUTPUT SETTING
  - FIX MOVIE CROP MAGNIFICATION
  - F-Log/HLG RECORDING

### Playback

- **During playback**

  !Playback Menu

  - PLAY BACK MENU
  - SWITCH SLOT
  - RAW CONVERSION
  - HEIF TO JPEG/HEIF CONVERSION
  - ERASE
  - SIMULTANEOUS DELETE
  - CROP
  - RESIZE
  - PROTECT
